decisions: Used Tauri emit/listen for PTY streaming matching existing agent-event pattern
Terminal theme uses hardcoded hex derived from HSL CSS variables
One terminal per project keyed by project ID
result.summary: Implemented Phase 6: Terminal. xterm.js v5 with fit/web-links/webgl addons, portable-pty Rust backend, PTY streaming via Tauri events, debounced ResizeObserver. Right pane split: FilesPanel (60%) + TerminalPanel (40%). One terminal per project. Dark theme matching app HSL variables.
